metaDescriptions.home: Expert Shopify agency. Design, development, SEO and CRO optimization for online stores. Boost your sales with SellifyWorks, your ecommerce growth partner.
metaDescriptions.about: Meet SellifyWorks, a specialized Shopify agency with years of experience. Our expert team helps you create and optimize your online store to maximize sales.
metaDescriptions.contact: Contact SellifyWorks to boost your Shopify store. Free consultation, no-obligation quote. Let's talk about growing your ecommerce business together.
metaDescriptions.blog: SellifyWorks blog: tips, tricks and strategies for Shopify. Learn about ecommerce, SEO, CRO and digital marketing to grow your online store.
metaDescriptions.privacyPolicy: SellifyWorks privacy policy. Information about how we collect, use and protect your personal data. Complete transparency in information processing.
metaDescriptions.cookiePolicy: SellifyWorks cookie policy. Detailed explanation about the use of cookies on our website and how you can manage them according to your preferences.

metadata.title: About Us - SellifyWorks
metadata.description: Learn more about SellifyWorks and our team of Shopify experts. Discover our mission, vision and experience in developing successful online stores.

hero.title: ABOUT US
hero.subtitle: We create exceptional e-commerce experiences on Shopify.

history.title: OUR STORY
history.content: This project started with a clear vision: to improve the shopping experience in e-commerce through high-quality technical solutions focused on Shopify. From that idea, SellifyWorks grew as a results-oriented technical consultancy, with an agile, scalable and customer-centered work model.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.content:
We drive e-commerce businesses through personalized technical solutions on Shopify. We focus on automating processes, optimizing store performance and applying agile methodologies that ensure fast and high-quality deliveries.

Our goal is for each client to be able to scale without worrying about technical complexity, trusting a consultancy that puts user experience and operational efficiency at the center of every decision.

values.title: OUR VALUES
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our work and define who we are.

quality.title: QUALITY
quality.content: We apply development practices like Extreme Programming because we believe that a good solution should not only work, but work well, fast and sustainably.

validation.title: VALIDATION
validation.content: We believe in the importance of validating ideas and solutions through constant testing and real feedback. This allows us to adjust and improve our approaches, ensuring we are always on the right track.

transparency.title: TRANSPARENCY
transparency.content: We believe in honest relationships, in iterative processes that allow constant evolution, and in the non-negotiable commitment to deliver value in every delivery.

team.title: OUR TEAM
team.subtitle: Meet the people who make your project's success possible.

mathias.description: Computer engineer with over 10 years of experience in software development.

cta.title: READY TO WORK TOGETHER?
cta.subtitle: Discover how we can help you take your business to the next level.

metadata.title: Shopify Services - SellifyWorks
metadata.description: Discover all our specialized Shopify services: development, design, SEO, CRO, migration and more. Boost your online store with our experts.

hero.title: OUR SERVICES
hero.subtitle: Complete Shopify solutions to grow your online business.

list.title: Growth Partner
list.description: Comprehensive growth partner for your online business.
